TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 55, "index": 12}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_nether_bricks", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "orange_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 37}, {"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 7, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft magenta_concrete_powder, I need to craft magenta_concrete, which requires placing 4 sand, 4 gravel, and 1 magenta_dye side by side in the crafting table. I will first move the sand from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
